From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 film directed by Nikhil Mahajan


I Love YouOfficial release posterDirected byNikhil MahajanWritten byNikhil MahajanProduced byGaurav BoseJyoti DeshpandeSunir KhetarpalStarring
Rakul Preet Singh
Pavail Gulati
Akshay Oberoi
CinematographyCameron BrysonEdited byAbhijit DeshpandeMusic bySongs:Shor PoliceGaurav ChatterjiBackground Score:Clinton CerejoProductioncompanies

Athena Production
Distributed byJioCinemaRelease date
16 June 2023 (2023-06-16)
Running time95 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
I Love You is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language romantic thriller film written and directed by Nikhil Mahajan. Produced under the banner of Jio Studios, it features Rakul Preet Singh, Akshay Oberoi and Pavail Gulati. An unofficial remake of the 2007 American horror drama P2, it was released for streaming on 16 June 2023 in JioCinema.[1]


Plot[edit]
Satya, a highly accomplished corporate executive, eagerly envisions a bright future with her fiancé. However, her life takes a sudden twist when, on the verge of boarding a flight to Delhi, she finds herself inexplicably trapped within the office premises. As the night unfolds, Satya encounters a series of alarming challenges and mysteries.

Cast[edit]
Rakul Preet Singh as Satya Prabhakar
Elisha Jeetu Jawrani as Young Satya
Pavail Gulati as Rakesh Oberoi
Akshay Oberoi as Vishal Kapoor
Kiran Kumar as Anthony
Prateek Pachori as Watchman
Sharad Jadhav as Driver Mishra Ji
Shivani Singh as Neha; Satya's friend
Production[edit]
The film was announced by Jio Studios featuring Rakul Preet Singh, Akshay Oberoi and Pavail Gulati.[2] The principal photography of the film started in 2022 and was wrapped in 2023.[3][4]

Release[edit]
The film's teaser was released on 2 June 2023.[5] The film's trailer was released on 8 June 2023.[6]
The film digitally premiered on 16 June 2023 on JioCinema.[1] Rakul Preet Singh promoted the film on Bigg Boss OTT 2.[7]

Soundtrack[edit]
I Love YouSoundtrack album by Shor Police and Gaurav ChatterjiReleased16 June 2023GenreFeature film soundtrackLength14:06LanguageHindiLabelSaregama
The film's music is composed by Shor Police and Gaurav Chatterji.
